mapper.update: update result_data set tzjg = #{tzjg,jdbcType=INTEGER}, yxje = #{yxje,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, yssy = #{yssy,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, sjsy = #{sjsy,jdbcType=DECIMAL} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, create_time, table_no, battle_no, fit_no, tzfx, tzxt, tzzh, tzje, tzzt, tzjg, yxje, yssy, sjsy from result_data where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select id, create_time, table_no, battle_no, fit_no, tzfx, tzxt, tzzh, tzje, tzzt, tzjg, yxje, yssy, sjsy from result_data
